frameset.note: based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus

example.name: it support
example.text: It seems that there's a race on to come up with the priciest single bottle
example.arg: there's a race on to come up with the priciest single bottle
example.note: Ignore the 'it'--it's just there for grammaticality

example.name: and again
example.text: Financial markets seem *trace* to be expecting easier credit as well.
example.arg: *trace* to be expecting easier credit as well
